name: The Rulers
description:
The Rulers DEMO

In the year 2050 humanity was invaded by alien species later called Governors. The beings wiped out half of humanity's existence within in a few seconds and those who remained alive they were forced to prove their worth. The game follows the story of Cliff, a 24-year-old man who he was honorably discharged from the air force during of a mission that took him out of sight.Now, in the face of despair, it is given to Cliff a second chance to prove his worth in the world of trials  of the Governor. Our players will be able to follow Cliff as he faces challenges and obstacles to clear each test and him watch ascending as a higher being. What's  on top of the world? Prove your worth to find out. 

Instructions:

Extract the zip and run the Exe.

Platforms: Windows.

How to play:  AWSD Keys to move around, Left click to attack with combos. 

How to win: Clear each stage and move to the next one.

Stage 1: Defeat all the enemies,once all enemies are defeated you will be presented with the change to enter the shop and equip new weapons. Once you are ready climb the ramp up and proceed to the next stage.

Stage 2: Same rules as stage 1 apply in stage 2.

Stage 3: Defeat all the enemies and Complete the game.
